member.name: T:ProgramTests.SearchOffersTest
member.summary: This test proves that a entrepreneur can search material publication's using a keyword, category or zone.

member.name: M:ProgramTests.SearchOffersTest.SearchOffersbyCategoryFound
member.summary: This test checks that an entrepreneur is able to search material publication's by the category.

member.name: M:ProgramTests.SearchOffersTest.SearchOffersbyCategoryNotFound
member.summary: This test checks that if an entrepreneur searches for a category that didn't exist it returns a list with 0 elements.

member.name: M:ProgramTests.SearchOffersTest.SearchOffersbyKeywordsFound
member.summary: This test checks that an entrepreneur is able to search material publication's with a keyword.

member.name: M:ProgramTests.SearchOffersTest.SearchOffersbyKeywordsNotFound
member.summary: This test checks that if an entrepreneur searches for a keyword that isn't included in a publication it returns a list with 0 elements.

member.name: M:ProgramTests.SearchOffersTest.SearchOffersbyZoneFound
member.summary: This test checks that an entrepreneur is able to search material publication's by the zone.

member.name: M:ProgramTests.SearchOffersTest.SearchOffersbyZoneNotFound
member.summary: This test checks that if an entrepreneur searches for a zone that isn't included in a publication or is to far away form the distance specified, it returns a list with 0 elements.
